Break Their Nerve.name: Break Their Nerve
Break Their Nerve.flavor: You make your enemy second-guess its decision to face you and your comrades in battle.
Break Their Nerve.effect: The target is marked until the end of your next turn.

Slash and Press.name: Slash and Press
Slash and Press.flavor: You slash your enemy across the midsection and push it back. You then turn with a snarl and beat back all other nearby foes.
Slash and Press.effect: After making the attack, you can push each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

Control the Field.name: Control the Field
Control the Field.flavor: You dominate the field of battle so strongly that enemies find your mere presence overwhelming.
Control the Field.effect: Each enemy within 5 squares of you is marked until the end of your next turn, and each takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). While adjacent to you, an enemy takes a penalty to saving throws against this ongoing damage. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.
